definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Taxi fares are chargeable by offline credit card via the internet.
sentences.chinese: 的士車費會透過離線方式以信用咭收取。
手寫多些信和咭給別人。

sentences.english: Passengers show credit card for verification purposes.
sentences.chinese: 乘客須出示信用咭以便覈實。

sentences.english: Your ProxCard is valid for one year, please renew your card annually.
sentences.chinese: 磁咭有效期爲一年，期滿請再登記續用。

sentences.english: Please present the membership card before purchase.
sentences.chinese: 請於購物前出示蘇港交流促進會會員咭。

sentences.english: He may want to get in touch with you in the future. Would you leave your card?
sentences.chinese: 他想以後再和你接洽。請留下你的咭片好嗎？

sentences.english: Write a thank you note to someone.
Membership card is non-transferable and must be presented with valid ID.
sentences.chinese: 尊尚會員咭不得轉讓，只供會員本人使用。

sentences.english: Sixty dollars deposit per card will be charged to your department.
sentences.chinese: 磁咭按金六十元將會向閣下工作部門收取。

sentences.english: Xi however looking at the invitation cards and paintings, Lenovo to his painting in the painting.
sentences.chinese: 汐然看着邀請咭與畫作比較，令他聯想畫中有畫。
沒有人要求要二千元的免費信用咭。

sentences.english: This VIP card is valid at all Mandarin Fish Maw outlets and counters in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 此咭適用於任何香港文華花膠專門店之分店及專櫃。

sentences.english: Four children milled and clattered about the rambling house.
sentences.chinese: 四個孩子在雜亂無章的屋子裏咭咭呱呱笑着打轉。

definition: see 卟啉, porphyrin/see 卟吩, porphin
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
move the mouth as in speaking
